subject: CRITICAL FIX: E2E Testing Now Mandatory at All Layers

content.summary: Fixed systemic unit/E2E gap that was shipping broken features
content.problem: Workers running unit tests (100% pass) but not E2E tests (92% fail). Broken UI features were being marked complete.
content.fix: Updated all protocols to mandate E2E tests BEFORE claiming completion
new_rules: Workers MUST run pnpm test:e2e before claiming needs-validation
Coordinators MUST run pnpm test:e2e at L2 and reject if they fail
Validators MUST verify E2E evidence exists from L1 and L2
Unit test success + E2E failure = NOT COMPLETE
